solution_line_template: If the left side of the triangle is {left_side_length}, and the right side is {right_side_longer_than_left} cm longer, the right side is {left_side_length}+{right_side_longer_than_left} = <<{left_side_length}+{right_side_longer_than_left}={right_side_length}>>{right_side_length} cm long.
The sum of the left and right sides of the triangle is {right_side_length}+{left_side_length} = <<{right_side_length}+{left_side_length}={sum_left_right_sides}>>{sum_left_right_sides} cm.

If the sum of all sides of the is {total_sum_sides}, and the left and right sides of the triangle are {sum_left_right_sides}, the triangle base is {total_sum_sides}-{sum_left_right_sides} = <<{total_sum_sides}-{sum_left_right_sides}={triangle_base}>>{triangle_base} cm.
